Title: Barrels of Fun
Description:
Oh, well now, let's have us some fun, $g boyo : girly;!

Those Ordo yaungol to the northwest have saved us the trouble o' havin' to make some bombs. They already have them there.

Let's put their explosive barrels to good use and destroy their oil-pumpin' machines, shall we?
ObjectivesText: Use Explosive Barrels found in Fire Camp Ordo to destroy the West, South, and East Oil Rigs.
CompletionText:
I'm a wee bit surprised by the lack o' explosions I've seen so far.

Are you well?
RewardText: Ho ho, that were a fine sight to see. I knew I should have gone up there with ya, $n!
